patthana7.21:1.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:2.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
